text: @realDonaldTrump And with your great wartime leadership you’ll soon pass 100,000 deaths and 2 Million infections too! Which of course by far leads the world in failure to contain #COVID19! Just another example how this @WhiteHouse defines “winning”. Open safely? #NotMyPresident #VoteBlue
